text: CLEVELAND - - The Cleveland Cavaliers have confirmed that reality star Khloe Kardashian gave birth to a baby girl early Thursday. The baby's father, Cleveland Cavaliers center Tristan Thompson, was present at Hillcrest Hospital during the birth, though it's not confirmed if he was allowed in the room. Can confirm Tristan Thompson was indeed at Hillcrest. He has since left, however. # Khloe @ wkyc pic. twitter. com / s6xPVSTnpJ â€” Tyler Carey ( @ TC _ CLE ) April 12, 2018 TMZ is reporting Kardashian gave birth around 4 a. m. and that the baby girl does not yet have a name.
